import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Menu } from 'src/app/Models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.scss'] }) export class SidebarComponent { menu: Menu[] = [ { title: 'Fill Attendance', icon: 'checkBox', }, { title: 'Dashboard', icon: 'team', }, ]; }
